price: (Nuhu) aravuga ati “Bantu banjye! Mu by’ukuri njye ndi umuburizi wanyu ugaragara,
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّي لَكُمۡ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi innī lakum nadhīrun mubīnun
